review: Love this Roku 3500 Streaming Stick (HDMI) that was included with my purchase of my new router Netgear Nighthawk x6. Steams quickly to my older non-smart television. I don't have to rely on my blue-ray as I was before and it's 'iffy' connection issues. Plug it in and wait for it to load and it's fast sailing. I haven't noticed any lag speed (but I have great wireless internet service, plus the new Nighthawk router). There is a slight wait when you click a button, but that's to be expected (as opposed to having my laptop connected via HDMI) and not an issue at all. I wish it had more free apps is my only suggestion. My Sony Blu-ray is loaded with apps that I regularly used.
author: I. C. Gonzalez
